name: How to design a landing page with Figma
description:
You donâ€™t need to be a Figma pro or pay for expensive assets to create your own Landing Page Design. With a little practice of the basic tools in Figma and some good tips and tricks, you can create your own Landing page designs in no time at all.

In this tutorial series, I will guide you through all the steps to properly create a complete landing page using Figma.
